channel.title: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?
channel.description:
Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?
Along with cloudflare, really ruins the experience IMHO

item.title: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?
item.dc:creator: mT8RQf
item.description:
oh sorry sometimes they are

like do you want phone notifications while logged in.

more often they are:

attempts at canvas fingerprinting or something, since I don’t actual log in to much while on / in TBB

but, they sure are annoying to have to click “not now” over and over

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?

item.description:

mT8RQf:

these popup push notifications

item.source: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?

item.title: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

mT8RQf:

isolation of streams

No, stream isolation is unrealated here. It is a purely connection related thing, whereas this is a security meassure implemented on the browser level.

You could activate it via “about:config”, though that would obviously change your browser fingerprint, making you more trackable. The setting would be “dom.push.enable”.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?

item.title: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?
item.dc:creator: mT8RQf
item.description:
so the same website, will need to be cleared of the popup cause of isolation of streams?

any thoughts to disabling it completely, I would do it in the about:config but of course that would dis anon myself.

hard to believe one now has to live with hitting these popups 500 times

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone Know if TBB has given any thought to disabling these popup push notifications?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

As far as I can tell, that is just a result of keeping every tab as secluded and seperate as possible. So, simply, security.

Have a nice day,

Ego
